content.body: I don't think so. There are too many open questions about it to start one yet
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I don't think so. There are too many open questions about it to start one yet

content.body: The proposal is implementable in a polyfill ever since it reached Stage 3. There haven't been architectural changes; just details around the edges
It should actually be an easy polyfill to write, since it can be largely composed on top of ListFormat and NumberFormat
